languages.text: "Завет Паутины учит нас читать сердца людей и нити грядущего. Когда нутро человека переполняется скверной и ядом, мы понимаем — время пришло. Три освобождающих удара. Три отповеди. Один клинок. Так мы служим Неумирающему. Так мы служим тебе и флагману".

"The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."
languages.original_text: "Завет Паутины учит нас читать сердца людей и нити грядущего. Когда нутро человека переполняется скверной и ядом, мы понимаем — время пришло. Три освобождающих удара. Три отповеди. Один клинок. Так мы служим Неумирающему. Так мы служим тебе и флагману".

traits.locale_text: "The way of Ahn'shini has taught us to read the hearts of men and the threads of what is to come. When corruption and poison have filled a soul to the brim, we know its time has come. Three liberating strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. That is how we serve the Undying One. That is how we serve you and your flagship."

"The way of Ahn'shini has taught us to read the hearts of men and the threads of what is to come. When corruption and poison have filled a soul to the brim, we know its time has come. Three liberating strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. That is how we serve the Undying One. That is how we serve you and your flagship."

"Ahn'shini teaches us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

"The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

"The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

languages.text: « Les Préceptes de la Toile nous apprennent à lire les fils de l'avenir et à comprendre le cœur d'autrui. Lorsqu'une âme est souillée du poison de la corruption, nous savons que son heure est venue. Nous apportons la libération. Trois coups. Trois reproches. Une lame. C'est ainsi que nous servons l'Immortel. C'est ainsi que nous vous servons, vous et votre vaisseau amiral. »
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

traits.locale_text: « Les Préceptes de la Toile nous apprennent à lire les fils de l'avenir et à comprendre le cœur d'autrui. Lorsqu'une âme est souillée du poison de la corruption, nous savons que son heure est venue. Nous apportons la libération. Trois coups. Trois reproches. Une lame. C'est ainsi que nous servons l'Immortel. C'est ainsi que nous vous servons, vous et votre vaisseau amiral. »

languages.text: «La Doctrina de la Red nos enseña a leer los hilos del futuro y entender los corazones ajenos. Cuando un alma se infecta del veneno de la corrupción, sabemos que es su hora. Le proporcionamos la liberación. Tres golpes. Tres condenas. Una hoja. Así es como servimos al Inmortal. Así es como l{mf|e|a}s servimos a usted y a su nave insignia».
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

traits.locale_text: «La Doctrina de la Red nos enseña a leer los hilos del futuro y entender los corazones ajenos. Cuando un alma se infecta del veneno de la corrupción, sabemos que es su hora. Le proporcionamos la liberación. Tres golpes. Tres condenas. Una hoja. Así es como servimos al Inmortal. Así es como l{mf|e|a}s servimos a usted y a su nave insignia».

languages.text: “织血罗网的教义教导我们解读未来的线索，理解他人的心灵。当某个灵魂充满了腐化的毒液时，我们就会明白，这个灵魂的大限已至。我们会带来解放：三次刺击，三次叱责，一把利刃。我们就是通过这样的方式侍奉不死之神，为你与你的旗舰提供服务。”
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网的教义教导我们解读未来的线索，理解他人的心灵。当某个灵魂充满了腐化的毒液时，我们就会明白，这个灵魂的大限已至。我们会带来解放：三次刺击，三次叱责，一把利刃。我们就是通过这样的方式侍奉不死之神，为你与你的旗舰提供服务。”

languages.text: 「ウェブの教義は、未来の糸を読み、他人の心を理解する方法を教えてくれます。魂が腐敗の毒で溢れている時こそ、その時が訪れたのです。そう、解放の時です。3回の攻撃。３つの叱責。１つの刀。これが不死の者への奉仕。これが私たちが、あなたとあなたの旗艦に仕える方法です」
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェブの教義は、未来の糸を読み、他人の心を理解する方法を教えてくれます。魂が腐敗の毒で溢れている時こそ、その時が訪れたのです。そう、解放の時です。3回の攻撃。３つの叱責。１つの刀。これが不死の者への奉仕。これが私たちが、あなたとあなたの旗艦に仕える方法です」

languages.text: "Die Grundsätze des Netzes lehren uns, die Fäden der Zukunft zu lesen und die Herzen anderer zu verstehen. Wenn eine Seele vom Gift der Verderbnis erfüllt ist, wissen wir, dass ihre Zeit gekommen ist. Wir bringen die Befreiung. Drei Schläge. Drei Tadel. Eine Klinge. So dienen wir dem Todlosen. So dienen wir Euch und Eurem Flaggschiff."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."

languages.text: "Ağ'ın İlkeleri bize geleceğin ipliklerini okuyup başkalarının kalplerini anlamayı öğretir. Birisinin ruhu yozlaşmanın zehriyle dolmuşsa vaktinin dolduğunu anlarız. Azat ederiz. Üç darbe. Üç zılgıt. Tek bıçak. Ölmeyen'e böyle hizmet ederiz. Sana ve sancak gemine böyle hizmet ederiz."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us to read the threads of the future and understand the hearts of others. When a soul is filled with the poison of corruption, we know its time has come. We bring liberation. Three strikes. Three rebukes. One blade. This is how we serve the Undying One. This is how we serve you and your flagship."
